channel.title: golang - Sq's blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Sq's blog

item.title: golang标准库-sort
item.description: 介绍 sort包提供了排序切片和用户自定义数据集的函数 使用 对struct进行排序 package sort_test import ( "fmt" "sort" ) type Person struct { Name string Age int } func (p Person) String() string { return fmt.Sprintf("%s: %d", p.Name, p.Age) } // ByAge implements sort.Interface for []Person based on // the Age field. type ByAge []Person func (a ByAge) Len() int { return len(a) } func (a ByAge) Swap(i, j int) { a[i], a[j] = a[j], a[i] } func (a ByAge) Less(i, j int) bool { return a[i].

item.title: golang使用prepare操作postgresqlDB
item.description: 背景 从mysql转为pg，对增删改查的语法没太多变化，但预处理还是有些不同 Mysql package main ... ... _stmt,_:=mysql.db.Prepare("SELECT * FROM table WHERE a=? AND b=?") _stmt.Exec(a1,b1) Postgresql package main ... ... _stmt,_:=pg.db.Prepare("SELECT * FROM table WHERE a=$1 AND b=$2") _stmt.Exec(a1,b1)
